name: Gday
description:
Hi friends! Recently, some stuff happened whereby a fine fellow wrapped Braytech in a "webview", added Google Adsense, and deployed it to the Google Play store for Android users every where. I didn't like this.

I like to make beautiful ad-less experiences and when someone counterfeits your sfotware, it can be pretty demoralising.

Please be nice to each other and don't do dumb things like invade while carrying motes.

Thank you.
